Courtside.Description: Unmatched proximity to the game, offering an immersive experience with player interactions.
Courtside.View_Quality: Unparalleled court-level view, placing you at the heart of the action.
Courtside.Unique_Features: Opportunity for player interactions and potential TV appearances.
Courtside.Accessibility: Direct access with limited mobility device space.
Courtside.Special_Perks: Exclusive access to VIP lounges, complimentary premium dining options.

Lower_Bowl.Description: Excellent mid-court views offering a balance between proximity and a panoramic perspective.
Lower_Bowl.View_Quality: Elevated views with a clear line of sight to the court.
Lower_Bowl.Unique_Features: Comfortable seating with added leg room, avoiding the crowds.
Lower_Bowl.Accessibility: Easy entrance access, with elevators and escalators to lower levels.
Lower_Bowl.Special_Perks: Access to select lounges and in-seat service for a premium experience.

Upper_Bowl.Description: Affordable options with a bird's eye view of the game, perfect for fans who want to soak in the atmosphere.
Upper_Bowl.View_Quality: Wide view of the entire court, allowing fans to see plays develop.
Upper_Bowl.Unique_Features: An economical choice for enjoying Knicks games.
Upper_Bowl.Accessibility: Accessible seating available, with convenient access to concessions and restrooms.
Upper_Bowl.Special_Perks: A budget-friendly way to enjoy the game with a full view of the court.

Skybox_and_Suites.Description: Private and luxurious viewing experience with exclusive amenities.
Skybox_and_Suites.View_Quality: Private viewing angle with the comfort of luxury seating.
Skybox_and_Suites.Unique_Features: Personal service, exclusive entry, and luxury dining options.
Skybox_and_Suites.Accessibility: VIP entrance with direct access to suites level.
Skybox_and_Suites.Special_Perks: Private space for groups, catering options, and access to exclusive clubs and lounges.

restaurants_bars.name: Clyde Fraziers Wine and Dine
restaurants_bars.description: Themed restaurant owned by Knicks legend Walt 'Clyde' Frazier, offering American cuisine and a free-throw basketball court.

restaurants_bars.name: Stout NYC
restaurants_bars.description: A spacious, bustling Irish pub known for its extensive selection of beers and proximity to Madison Square Garden.

restaurants_bars.name: The Pennsy Food Hall
restaurants_bars.description: A food hall located right above Penn Station, offering a variety of food options for Knicks fans before the game.

restaurants_bars.name: Smiths Bar & Grill
restaurants_bars.description: Classic sports bar atmosphere with a wide selection of beers and American fare, perfect for pre-game gatherings.

restaurants_bars.name: John Sullivans Bar & Grill
restaurants_bars.description: Cozy Irish pub offering hearty meals and a vibrant atmosphere, a short walk from Madison Square Garden.

restaurants_bars.name: Hudson Station Bar & Grill
restaurants_bars.description: A popular gathering spot for sports enthusiasts, featuring an extensive menu and game day specials.

accommodations.name: Hotel Pennsylvania
accommodations.description: Historic hotel offering straightforward accommodations with easy access to Madison Square Garden.

accommodations.name: The New Yorker, A Wyndham Hotel
accommodations.description: Iconic art deco hotel with comfortable rooms, located close to Madison Square Garden.

accommodations.name: Moxy NYC Times Square
accommodations.description: Trendy hotel with unique, stylish rooms and rooftop bar, minutes away from Madison Square Garden.

accommodations.name: Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott New York Midtown Manhattan/Penn Station
accommodations.description: Comfortable and convenient hotel offering complimentary breakfast and stunning views, located next to Penn Station and Madison Square Garden.

tourist_attractions.name: Empire State Building
tourist_attractions.description: Iconic skyscraper offering observation decks with spectacular views of New York City.

tourist_attractions.name: Times Square
tourist_attractions.description: Famous for its bright lights, shopping, entertainment, and New Year's Eve ball drop, a must-visit location in NYC.

tourist_attractions.name: Central Park
tourist_attractions.description: A green oasis in the heart of New York City, offering walking paths, boat rentals, and the Central Park Zoo.

tourist_attractions.name: The Metropolitan Museum of Art
tourist_attractions.description: One of the world's largest and finest art museums, featuring over two million works of art spanning 5,000 years.

tourist_attractions.name: The Statue of Liberty
tourist_attractions.description: A symbol of freedom and democracy, this iconic statue is located on Liberty Island and accessible by ferry.

team_related_activities.name: Madison Square Garden All Access Tour
team_related_activities.description: Behind-the-scenes tour of Madison Square Garden, exploring exclusive VIP areas and commemorating over 130 years of legendary Garden history.

team_related_activities.name: Knicks Legends Experience
team_related_activities.description: Special events featuring former Knicks players with autograph sessions and meet-and-greets, held throughout the year.

options.description: Multiple subway lines including the A, C, E, 1, 2, 3, and others stop at 34th Street Penn Station, directly below Madison Square Garden.
Penn Station serves as a major hub for NJ Transit, Long Island Rail Road, and Amtrak, providing easy access from various locations.

best_places_to_buy.name: Official Team Website
best_places_to_buy.description: The primary source for all ticket sales, offering guaranteed authenticity.

best_places_to_buy.name: Ticketmaster
best_places_to_buy.description: Authorized ticketing partner offering authentic Knicks tickets.

best_places_to_buy.name: StubHub
best_places_to_buy.description: Reliable secondary marketplace that offers verified resold Knicks tickets.

ticket_purchasing_tips.ways_to_save: Consider attending weekday games which can be cheaper than weekend matchups. Look for ticket bundle deals. Sign up for fan clubs or newsletters for potential discounts.
ticket_purchasing_tips.avoiding_scalpers: Always purchase tickets from official sources or reputable secondary market sites with buyer protections. Avoid cash transactions outside the venue to prevent scams.
